## Description {#details}

A single location within a location list.

Entries are stored in the DWARF5 form even if they originally come from a DWARF&lt;=4 location list.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-h">DWARFDebugLoc.h</a>.
